name: Zera-Chan Puzzle: Pitatto Pair
overview: Zera-chan Puzzle Pittato Pair is a puzzle game with 4 difficulty levels (easy, normal, hard & special) and 3 game modes. The game features more than 240 different stages. 1st mode: Clear the stage pieces in a limited time to advance to the next one. In this mode the vs mode is a race that got a time limit of 100 and the first player to reach the goal wins, but to make the character move the player have to clear all the pieces in different stages. 2nd mode: Some kind of time attack dead mode. The player have to clear all the pieces of each stage in a limited time. Every 5 stages the background image changes. 3rd mode: Join the pieces and clear the stages. You can push some of them vertically and some in horizontal way.
